column1: A ''lily'' is a plant of the ''[[wikipedia:Lilium
column2: lilium]]'' genus, or to visually similar plants. It derives from Greek ''λείριον'' through Latin, ultimately of ancient Egyptian origin.<ref>[http://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/lily Wiktionary entry]</ref>
